div.p: I wanted to be a policeperson believe it or not! That’s what I wanted to do when I was at school, I always wanted to join the
Metropolitan Police but when I left school it became quite clear the only reason I wanted to do that was because I wanted to follow my 2 friends
who actually joined the Met so I think I learned very quickly after school because sometimes when you’re in school you dream about things
but sometimes it’s not quite the right vocation to go into because sometimes you do follow your friends and listen to what they want to do
but that’s what I thought I wanted to do and I did actually go for an interview for it and realised at the interview that it wasn’t for me;
saying that, though, I didn’t have the education to go in there anyway but saying that I did get to the interview stage which I was quite pleased about.
